title: AWO Contribution Artifact Schema
description: Schema for the AWO Contribution Artifact (A-4). Defines machine-readable requirements for substantive research contributions and their traceability.

metadata.description: YAML-equivalent metadata extracted from the governing Markdown artifact.

content_summary.description: High-level summary of the substantive contribution.

inputs.description: References to upstream inputs or artifacts used in the contribution.

limitations.description: Declared limitations, uncertainties, or known gaps in the contribution.

producing_role.description: Declared role responsible for producing the contribution artifact.

reasoning_record_ref.description: Optional reference to an associated reasoning record artifact.
